channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Fpga_journey_graphics
item.description: Scrumbling ssd1306 how the screen will communicate with the rest of the system? OUR GOAL drive the screen using the FPGA - building the physical driver for the OLED screen HOW SCREENS WORK? HOW CAN YOU COMMUNICATE WITH IT?

item.title: Perspective Projection Matrix
item.description: I usually find it hard to take something at face value, while doing some graphics programming, I frequently came across matrices, and for the most part, they were not that complex since I knew some linear algebra beforehand. However, the perspective projection matrix seemed confusing, and I couldn’t wrap my head around it, so I decided to reconstruct it from the ground up Intuition Well, we have a 3D scene, but our screen is 2D.
